author: James Martin
method: Drain the bulgur wheat well, pressing down lightly to ensure all the water is removed. Put in a large bowl. Add all the other ingredients and mix well. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz bulgur wheat, soaked in cold water overnight,  3 tbsp roughly chopped mint ,  3 tbsp roughly chopped coriander,  2 tbsp chopped parsley,  ½ red onion, finely chopped,  50g/1¾oz pistachio nuts, roughly chopped,  100g/3½oz fresh raspberries,  100g/3½oz dried apricots, roughly chopped,  1 pomegranate, seeds only,  1 lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
